g.text: into manageable chunks based on specified parameters,
ensuring that each chunk contains meaningful information
while adhering to a maximum size (chunk_size=500). This
allows for better handling of context and improves retrieval
By allowing for a chunk_overlap of 100 characters, the text
splitter retains context between consecutive chunks. This
overlap helps ensure that important information that may
span across two chunks is not lost, improving the quality of
the retrieval results, especially for nuanced queries.
Using a custom regex separator that works better with PDFs,
separating based on headers and lists
The length_function=len ensures that the splitter
dynamically calculates the length of each chunk based on
character count. This functionality allows for
straightforward adjustments to chunk sizes without needing
additional processing or complexity, making it easy to tune
performance for specific datasets or retrieval tasks.
The prompt template provides a clear structure
for answering questions, emphasizing the use
of context and encouraging concise, direct
Instructs the model to acknowledge when it
doesn't know the answer, preventing the
Encourages the use of lists and tables to
comprehension and making answers more visually
threshold of 0.8 to ensure retrieval of
diverse and relevant documents, enhancing the
